mapper.select:
select bno, title, file, costs, cre_dt, views, address, add_ty, other, content, goods, point from board order by
title views costs add_ty goods point bno
asc desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
mapper.insert: insert into board( title,add_ty,address,costs,content, file,cre_dt) values( #{title},#{add_ty},#{address},#{costs},#{content}, #{attachFile},now())
mapper.delete: delete from board where bno=#{bno} and (pwd is null or pwd=#{pwd})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, cre_dt=now(), afile=#{attachFile} where bno=#{bno} and (pwd is null or pwd=#{password})
mapper.select: select title, content, file from board where bno=#{bno}
